translation.en: -[car horns honking] -[motivational rock music plays]
translation.zh: NETFLIX 纪录片系列

translation.en: ♪ A happy, hungry man's ♪
translation.zh: 一个快乐又饥饿的男人

translation.en: ♪ Travelin' all across the sea And the land ♪
translation.zh: 游遍世间山与大海

translation.en: ♪ He's trying to understand ♪
translation.zh: 他尽情领略

translation.en: ♪ The art of pasta Pork, chicken, and lamb ♪
translation.zh: 各路美食之艺术

translation.en: ♪ He will drive to you ♪
translation.zh: 他开车到你身边

translation.en: ♪ He will fly to you ♪
translation.zh: 飞到你身边

translation.en: ♪ He will sing for you ♪
translation.zh: 他为你歌唱

translation.en: ♪ And he'll dance for you ♪
translation.zh: 为你起舞

translation.en: ♪ He will laugh with you ♪
translation.zh: 与你共欢笑

translation.en: ♪ And he'll cry for you ♪
translation.zh: 同悲泣

translation.en: ♪ There's just one thing He asks in return ♪
translation.zh: 只有一事相求

translation.en: ♪ Somebody feed, somebody feed ♪
translation.zh: 只有一事相求 有没有人…

translation.en: ♪ Can somebody ♪
translation.zh: 有没有人

translation.en: ♪ Somebody feed Phil? ♪
translation.zh: 能让菲尔来蹭饭？

translation.en: ♪ Somebody feed him now ♪
translation.zh: 让他现在来蹭饭 剧名：费城

translation.en: The great WC Fields was once asked what he would like on his epitaph,
translation.zh: 曾有人问伟大的WC菲尔德斯他想在墓志铭上写什么

translation.en: and he said, "All things considered, I'd rather be in Philadelphia."
translation.zh: 他说：“综合各方面考虑我更愿意待在费城”

translation.en: I know Philadelphia because I grew up in New York,
translation.zh: 我了解费城 因为我在纽约长大

translation.en: and I think my first trip was to the Franklin Institute in fifth grade.
translation.zh: 我第一次旅行好像是五年级那年去富兰克林研究所

translation.en: And then I met a girl who grew up right outside of Philadelphia,
translation.zh: 然后我遇见了一个在费城郊外长大的女孩

translation.en: and she seemed pretty good, so I married her.
translation.zh: 她看起来相当不错 所以我娶了她

translation.en: That was 32 years ago.
translation.zh: 那是32年前

translation.en: And I've been coming back ever since to see Monica's family and to just visit
translation.zh: 从那以后 我就经常回费城看望莫妮卡的家人

translation.en: this city that's got such character steeped in civic pride.
translation.zh: 参观这座个性浸润在公民自豪感中的城市

translation.en: They call it the City of Brotherly Love.
translation.zh: 他们称之为“友爱之城”

translation.en: This is also where they wrote "All men are created equal."
translation.zh: 这也是先辈们写下“人人生而平等”的地方

translation.en: But of course, it's more inclusive than that.
translation.zh: 但当然了 它的包容性并不止步于此

translation.en: Today, this spirit lives on and even flourishes here,
translation.zh: 如今这种精神仍然存在甚至在这里蓬勃发展

translation.en: especially in the community of chefs you're about to meet.
translation.zh: 尤其在你将见到的这些主厨身上

translation.en: Usually the first stop for me in Philadelphia is the Reading Terminal Market.
translation.zh: 通常我来这里的第一站是瑞汀车站市场

translation.en: It's just one of the great markets of the world,
translation.zh: 它是世界上的大型市场之一

translation.en: and it has some of the best food you'll ever find anywhere.
translation.zh: 这里有一些你在其他任何地方都找不到的美食

translation.en: -All right, Phil, what can get for you? -Can you make me a little sampler?
translation.zh: -你要买点什么？-能给我先来一份招牌卷饼吗？

translation.en: So you want a regular pretzel, first of all.
translation.zh: 你想先要一份普通椒盐卷饼

translation.en: Absolutely. These are my favorite pretzels. This is the go-to.
translation.zh: -当然 它们是我的最爱-最经典的选择

translation.en: [Phil] I just always get a plain pretzel,
translation.zh: 我总是买一份普通椒盐卷饼

translation.en: but today I'm having them stuffed with stuff.
translation.zh: 但今天我要在里面塞满料

translation.en: -Gonna pick it up in a couple minutes. -[vendor] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们几分钟后来拿-是吗？

translation.en: 'Cause I think I'm gonna get a lot of stuff here.
translation.zh: 我觉得我会在这里买到很多吃的

translation.en: -Who am I talking to? -Talk to G first.
translation.zh: -找谁点单？-先跟G说

translation.en: Talk to these people? I know I want a Reuben, right?
translation.zh: 跟这些人说吗？我知道自己想要鲁宾三明治 对吧？

translation.en: [man] Yeah. Pastrami Reuben.
translation.zh: 可以 要哪种鲁宾三明治？

translation.en: Beautiful. So you know, I used to work in a deli in New York.
translation.zh: 真好看 我以前在纽约的一家熟食店工作

translation.en: -[G] Wow. Nice. Deli man. -I'm a deli man.
translation.zh: -我是做熟食的-做熟食的？

translation.en: -So I'm gonna be tough, critically. -I heard that, yes.
translation.zh: -所以我会非常严厉和挑剔-是吗？

translation.en: [Phil] It looks… Oh, you're doing it right.
translation.zh: 你的手法没问题

translation.en: -Can I have a little taste of that meat? -[G] Yes.
translation.zh: -我能尝一下那种肉吗？-能

translation.en: -I love you. Thank you. -[man 1] You got it.
translation.zh: -我爱你 谢谢-不客气

translation.en: -You know what you're doing. -Yep.
translation.zh: -你还真是在行-没错

translation.en: All right. Where am I going? This way!
translation.zh: 好了 我要去哪？这边！

translation.en: -[Phil] Dinic's! -[man 2] Hello.
translation.zh: -迪尼克的店！-你好

translation.en: -I love you guys. How you doin'? -Doin' well.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 多年来我一直光顾你的店

translation.en: I've been coming here for years. You know what I want.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 多年来我一直光顾你的店 你知道我的口味

translation.en: -You want roast pork, probably. -With everything.
translation.zh: -应该是烤猪肉吧-所有小料都加上

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 马上就好

translation.en: Where's Tia?
translation.zh: 蒂亚在哪？

translation.en: -[Tia] Right here. -Oh. Hi, how are you?
translation.zh: 就在这里 嗨 你好吗？

translation.en: -I've heard all about you. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -久仰大名-谢谢

translation.en: -Heard you're the sweet potato pie queen. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你是甜薯派女王-没错

translation.en: If you could put together what you know I have to have.
translation.zh: 各种必吃的口味 都帮我来一份

translation.en: -[Tia] Okay. -So nice to meet you.
translation.zh: -好-很高兴见到你

translation.en: -[both] Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you. There go my daughter Lamirah.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-这是我女儿 拉米拉

translation.en: [gasps] The whole family!
translation.zh: -嗨-全家人都在？

translation.en: -[man 3] This is a family business. -I love this. Oh my God.
translation.zh: -家族生意-我很喜欢 天哪

translation.en: -You're living the pie life. -Yes!
translation.zh: -你们都过着有派人生-没错！

translation.en: Oh yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: Oh, here's a place with a turkey leg. I love a turkey leg.
translation.zh: 这里有家店卖火鸡腿 我爱火鸡腿

translation.en: -It's Phil Rosenthal! -Oh, hello.
translation.zh: -是菲尔罗森塔尔！-你好！

translation.en: -[woman] Hi, Phil! -Oh, hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 菲尔！-嗨！

translation.en: -How you doing? It's wonderful to see you. -[Phil] I love seeing you.
translation.zh: -你好吗？见到你太棒了-我很高兴见到你们

translation.en: So I wanted to bring Monica, and I thought it'd be nice
translation.zh: 我想着把莫妮卡带来我觉得叫来她儿时的朋友

translation.en: to bring her childhood friends Mary Kate, Linda, and Celestine.
translation.zh: 玛丽凯特、琳达、塞莱斯汀会很好

translation.en: You know, we don't get to see them very often, but here they are.
translation.zh: 我们平时很少见到她们但是她们都来了

translation.en: So, we'll just share a couple of things, that's all.
translation.zh: 有些我们要一起吃

translation.en: -[Linda] You got it all. -[Phil] Yeah. How's everybody doing?
translation.zh: -你都买来了-没错 大家过得怎么样？

translation.en: -[Linda] Everyone's good. -[Monica] So good.
translation.zh: -大家都很好-非常好

translation.en: -Can I help you here? -Please.
translation.zh: -需要我帮忙吗？-好

translation.en: Oh, here we got a lobster in case you like lobster.
translation.zh: 我们买了龙虾 万一你们喜欢龙虾

translation.en: -[gasps] Are you guys crazy? -[Linda] I might like lob…
translation.zh: 你们疯了吗？ -我可能会喜欢-这是鸡肉

translation.en: -[Linda] Oh, here's some chicken. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -我可能会喜欢-这是鸡肉 -谢谢-这是莫妮卡通常的早餐…

translation.en: This is what Monica usually gets for breakfast.
translation.zh: -谢谢-这是莫妮卡通常的早餐…

translation.en: -[Linda] Is this what Monica cooks you? -Listen, I love cooking.
translation.zh: 她给你做这个吗？ 听着 我很喜欢烹饪 它让我放松

translation.en: -It relaxes me, the cooking. -It's like when we were kids, Mon.
translation.zh: 听着 我很喜欢烹饪 它让我放松 就像我们小时候那样 小莫

translation.en: She had the Easy-Bake Oven, the Easy-Bake refrigerator.
translation.zh: 她有简易烤箱玩具、简易冰箱玩具

translation.en: -She had all the Suzy Homemaker stuff. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 她有苏西家庭主妇全套玩具

translation.en: Really? You'd think she'd have learned something.
translation.zh: 你们肯定会以为她学到了点什么

translation.en: I don't know if you like the best pretzels in the world, do you?
translation.zh: 不知道你们喜不喜欢全世界最好吃的椒盐卷饼 你们喜欢吗？

translation.en: -You need a pretzel? -Oh, thank you, Phil.
translation.zh: -要吃椒盐卷饼吗？-谢谢 菲尔

translation.en: Oh, and here's like a turkey, ham, egg, and cheese pretzel.
translation.zh: 这个好像是火鸡火腿、鸡蛋和芝士椒盐卷饼

translation.en: -[Linda] Oh my God! -[Mary Kate] What?
translation.zh: -天哪！-什么？

translation.en: [Celestine] Never heard! [Phil] I'll try it.
translation.zh: -我从没听说过！-我来尝尝

translation.en: They didn't have that at recess at Saint Joe's.
translation.zh: 圣约瑟夫学校课间休息时不吃这个

translation.en: Who remembers when you first met?
translation.zh: 谁记得你们第一次见面的情景？

translation.en: Homeroom in high school.
translation.zh: 高中课前点名教室

translation.en: You met her homeroom in high school, but you guys lived
translation.zh: 你在高中的点名教室认识了她但你们住在

translation.en: on the same block?
translation.zh: 同一街区？

translation.en: -[Linda] Next door. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -隔壁-隔壁…

translation.en: -[Phil] Next door… -Same step.
translation.zh: -隔壁-隔壁… 我们共用一个门廊

translation.en: -Shared the stoop. -[Linda] Yep.
translation.zh: -我们共用门廊-没错

translation.en: [Monica] We have a picture of us.
translation.zh: 我们有一张我们的照片

translation.en: I was maybe two, and you were maybe three.
translation.zh: 当时我大概两岁 你大概三岁

translation.en: Sitting on that stoop with all the kids from Magnolia…
translation.zh: 和所有孩子坐在门廊上…

translation.en: -So since birth really? -[Linda] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这么说真的是从出生起？-没错

translation.en: -[Monica] Oh! -These are Tia's famous sweet potato pies.
translation.zh: 这是蒂亚大名鼎鼎的甜薯派

translation.en: You gotta try these. 'Cause everyone's talking about these sweet potato pies.
translation.zh: 你们一定要尝尝大家都在讨论这些甜薯派

translation.en: -[Celestine] Okay. -You don't have to eat everything.
translation.zh: -好-你们不用全部都吃完

translation.en: -[Linda] Well, thank God. -Well, it's impossible.
translation.zh: -谢天谢地-不过那是不可能的

translation.en: I will think less of you if you don't, but…
translation.zh: 如果你们没吃完我会小瞧你们的 但是…

translation.en: -[Linda] I'll try everything. -[Celestine] I have the sweet potato here.
translation.zh: 我会全部都尝尝 -我这里有甜薯派-非常好吃

translation.en: [Monica] It's so great.
translation.zh: -我这里有甜薯派-非常好吃

translation.en: -It's awesome. -Thank you, Phillip.
translation.zh: -太棒了-谢谢你 菲利普

translation.en: Thank you for inviting my friends. -How am I doing?
translation.zh: 我做得如何？ 你做得很棒

translation.en: -[Mary Kate] Well. -You're doing very well. -This was so fun. -[Monica] Thank you, Phil.
translation.zh: -非常好-耶！太好玩了

translation.en: I love you guys. I'm so happy to see you.
translation.zh: -我爱你们 我很高兴见到你们-我们也是

translation.en: [Mary Kate] Thank you so much. This was great.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 太好了 （约翰伊鱼市 吃鱼更长寿）

translation.en: [Phil] Shola Olunloyo is one of the great food people here in Philly.
translation.zh: 肖拉奥伦洛约是费城最厉害的美食家之一

translation.en: He's a Nigerian chef and food writer
translation.zh: 他是一名尼日利亚主厨兼美食作家

translation.en: who helps people brainstorm new culinary concepts.
translation.zh: 帮助人们动脑筋想出新的烹饪概念

translation.en: So an invite to his house for a backyard barbecue
translation.zh: 所以受邀去他家后院烧烤

translation.en: probably doesn't mean burgers and hot dogs.
translation.zh: 可能并不意味着吃汉堡和热狗

translation.en: [Shola] So here's the garden.
translation.zh: 这里是花园

translation.en: -[Phil] Oh my goodness. -Nature in the city.
translation.zh: -天哪-城市中的大自然

translation.en: Oh, it's gorgeous. Look at this. I love it.
translation.zh: 太美了 看看啊 我好喜欢

translation.en: We're having brunch.
translation.zh: 我们要吃早午餐

translation.en: -We are? -Yeah, we are.
translation.zh: -我们吗？-对 我们

translation.en: I'm gonna start with the quick stuff. You know, this is squid.
translation.zh: 先从快餐开始 这是鱿鱼

translation.en: Just really good, fresh calamari.
translation.zh: 真不错 新鲜的鱿鱼肉

translation.en: One of the failures of cooking squid is just not using enough heat.
translation.zh: 做不好鱿鱼的原因之一就是火候不够

translation.en: -It needs to be hot, as you can see. -[Phil] What… Oh man!
translation.zh: 一定要用高温烤箱 你可以看看 -天哪！-里面温度相当高

translation.en: That is raging hot.
translation.zh: -天哪！-里面温度相当高

translation.en: [Shola] We're hovering around 700 degrees.
translation.zh: 我们控制在370摄氏度左右

translation.en: Don't be alarmed at my use of my hands.
translation.zh: 别因为我直接上手感到恐慌

translation.en: Some things require more dexterity than a tool can give you.
translation.zh: 有些事需要用比工具更灵活的东西

translation.en: Most people are heat-shy and don't have
translation.zh: 大部分人都惧用高温

translation.en: an impression of how much heat it takes to actually cook things.
translation.zh: 不知道烹饪时实际该使用多大的火候

translation.en: Heat-shy.
translation.zh: 惧用高温

translation.en: Heat-shy, yeah.
translation.zh: 惧用高温 没错

translation.en: -[Shola] If you wanna cook with fire… -Yeah.
translation.zh: 如果你想用火做饭

translation.en: …you can't be afraid of fire.
translation.zh: 就不能害怕火

translation.en: But it cooks pretty fast. You can already see…
translation.zh: 你已经看到了 肉很快就熟了

translation.en: That was fast.
translation.zh: 真的很快

translation.en: Remember, I didn't spray anything on the grill grates.
translation.zh: 记住了 我没有在烤架上喷任何东西

translation.en: And it's not sticking.
translation.zh: 不会粘住

translation.en: So you're using the right heat to cook the squid.
translation.zh: 要用合适的温度烹饪鱿鱼

translation.en: -Look at that. -[Phil] Oh man! That is superfast.
translation.zh: -你看那个-天哪！超级快

translation.en: [Shola] That's it, and then you're done.
translation.zh: 就这样 这样就算烹饪好了

translation.en: And, as soon as we're done, a little olive oil.
translation.zh: 只要一出烤箱 就加一点橄榄油

translation.en: -And be generous with your olive oil. -[Phil] Yes.
translation.zh: -多放点橄榄油-好

translation.en: Luxury without generosity is not luxury, you know?
translation.zh: 没有慷慨的奢侈不是奢侈你知道吗？

translation.en: You have to make it nice.
translation.zh: 做就要好好做

translation.en: -That's a great saying. -Yeah, indeed.
translation.zh: -那句俗语说得真好-没错 确实是

translation.en: [Shola] These are leaves of capers from Italy.
translation.zh: 这些是意大利的刺山柑叶

translation.en: I think most people eat capers, but most people don't…
translation.zh: 大部分人吃刺山柑 但他们不…

translation.en: -They don't know about the leaves. -Caper leaves are delicious.
translation.zh: -了解叶子-叶子很美味

translation.en: I had no idea about the leaves.
translation.zh: 我对叶子完全不了解

translation.en: Care for some squid, señor?
translation.zh: 想来点鱿鱼吗 先生？

translation.en: -[Phil giggles] Yes! -Two-minute squid.
translation.zh: 想！ 两分钟鱿鱼

translation.en: See how juicy it is? Just barely cooked, but cooked.
translation.zh: 看到汁水多么丰厚了吗？没怎么烹饪 但是也能吃

translation.en: Not tough just because you're not overcooking it.
translation.zh: 不会嚼不烂 因为没有过度烹饪

translation.en: -Shola, I love you already. -And the caper leaf.
translation.zh: -肖拉 我已经爱上你了-还有刺山柑叶

translation.en: [Shola] Yeah, the caper leaf is genius.
translation.zh: 没错 刺山柑叶是点睛之笔

translation.en: And what's nice about this squid game, you're not shot in the head.
translation.zh: 这场鱿鱼游戏的好处就是你不会被击中头部

translation.en: -[Shola] So you see that? -What's going on?
translation.zh: -所以你看到了吗？-怎么回事？

translation.en: I'm making you a quick baked eggs.
translation.zh: 我在给你做速烘蛋

translation.en: -That's cooking. -A baked egg in tomato sauce?
translation.zh: -正在烹饪中-番茄酱烘蛋？

translation.en: Spicy tomato sauce, almost like a…
translation.zh: 辣番茄酱 差不多就像…

translation.en: -[Phil] Like a shakshuka. -Like a shaky-shuka.
translation.zh: -就像沙卡蔬卡-就像沙卡蔬卡

translation.en: [Phil] You know I like that.
translation.zh: 你知道我喜欢那道菜

translation.en: But you see how that works in this oven? It's like…
translation.zh: 但是你知道这在烤箱里是怎么做成的吗？真的…

translation.en: -[Phil] Fast. -You know, fast.
translation.zh: -很快-非常快

translation.en: [Shola] Do that.
translation.zh: 这样做

translation.en: Wow. Who taught you how to cook?
translation.zh: 哇 谁教你烹饪的？

translation.en: A chef I worked for named Fritz Blank.
translation.zh: 一位叫弗里茨布兰克的主厨我为他做过事

translation.en: Where was that?
translation.zh: 那是在哪？

translation.en: It was a restaurant called Deux Cheminées in Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 费城一家叫“两根烟囱”的餐厅

translation.en: He was a Pennsylvania-German-Dutch chef.
translation.zh: 他是一位宾夕法尼亚、德国、荷兰混血的主厨

translation.en: -Look how quickly that was. -[Phil] That was 15 seconds!
translation.zh: -看看有多快-用时15秒！

translation.en: [Shola] That's right.
translation.zh: 没错 我的朋友

translation.en: Did you have an Easy-Bake Oven when you were little?
translation.zh: 你小时候有没有玩过简易烤箱玩具？

translation.en: -[Shola chuckles] I wish. -[Phil chuckles]
translation.zh: 我倒希望玩过

translation.en: [Shola] I'm not trying to make a pizza.
translation.zh: 我不是想做披萨 这是速食乡村面包

translation.en: It's just a quick rustic bread, something I can dip in tomato sauce.
translation.zh: 我不是想做披萨 这是速食乡村面包 我能用来蘸番茄酱

translation.en: So, that is it.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: We're going to have bread in less than
translation.zh: 我们马上就能吃到面包…

translation.en: 90 seconds, maybe.
translation.zh: 也许不到90秒

translation.en: -I like pizza, cooking with a wood oven. -[Phil] Me too.
translation.zh: 我喜欢披萨喜欢吃用木炉烤成的披萨

translation.en: [Shola] All right, there we go.

translation.en: -[Shola] Pane! -Just do this?
translation.zh: -面包！-就这么吃？

translation.en: -[Shola] Yeah, yeah. -Oh man.

translation.en: -[Shola] Wanna get the yolky yolk. -Yes, we do.
translation.zh: 我们要吃软滑的蛋黄

translation.en: -[Shola] There you go. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -对 确实是-给你 谢谢 你不和我一起吃吗？

translation.en: -There you are. -Aren't you joining me?
translation.zh: 谢谢 你不和我一起吃吗？

translation.en: I am joining you, Phil.

translation.en: [Shola] Absolutely. Look. This is the best part.

translation.en: A little messy, but…

translation.en: Oh man!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: [Shola] With the fresh basil.
translation.zh: 配上新鲜罗勒叶

translation.en: We're eating like pigs, but this is fantastic, you know?
translation.zh: 我们在像猪一样进食但这样真的很棒 知道吗？

translation.en: $14.95. Have a nice day.
translation.zh: 14.95美元 祝你今天愉快

translation.en: [Shola] Well, isn't that…
translation.zh: 是不是很…

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 完美

translation.en: While you're doing that, I'm gonna cook a steak.
translation.zh: 趁你吃的时候 我来做牛排

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: He doesn't know it, but I've moved in to his basement.
translation.zh: 他不知道但我已经搬进了他的地下室

translation.en: -How do you like your steak? -Medium rare.
translation.zh: -你喜欢几分熟？-三分熟

translation.en: Okay, good.
translation.zh: 好 没问题

translation.en: This is my favorite restaurant.
translation.zh: 这是我最喜欢的餐厅

translation.en: What do you think? Cooking with fire, isn't it fun?
translation.zh: -用火做饭是不是很有趣？-我觉得非常棒

translation.en: I think it's awesome. You're awesome.
translation.zh: -用火做饭是不是很有趣？-我觉得非常棒 -我觉得你好厉害-简单 我们开吃吧

translation.en: [Shola] Easy. Yeah, let's do this. That is all off.
translation.zh: -我觉得你好厉害-简单 我们开吃吧 做好了

translation.en: And I like to douse a steak heavily with olive oil once it comes out.
translation.zh: 我喜欢做好牛排后浇上一层厚厚的橄榄油

translation.en: So this actually prevents the meat from losing all its juices.
translation.zh: 其实这样可以防止肉失去汁液

translation.en: So, by the time it rests and I slice it, you'll see it'll be nice and juicy, delicious.
translation.zh: 等肉静置好 我切成片时你会看到牛排多汁又美味

translation.en: Look at that.
translation.zh: 看看

translation.en: This is why you always get a cutting board with channels.
translation.zh: 这就是为什么总是要用有槽的砧板

translation.en: [both] So you can do this.
translation.zh: 所以你可以这么做

translation.en: People!
translation.zh: 各位！

translation.en: -Shola… -It's fine.
translation.zh: -肖拉…-没关系

translation.en: [Phil] I like Shola.
translation.zh: 我喜欢肖拉

translation.en: -[Phil] Look at this. -And we're done. One more hit of salt.
translation.zh: 做好了 再加一点盐

translation.en: -[Phil] I go? -You got steak.
translation.zh: -我可以吃了？-可以

translation.en: -It looks like this one has my name on it. -[Shola chuckles]
translation.zh: 看起来这片肉是为我量身定做的

translation.en: What a morning I'm having!
translation.zh: 我度过了一个多么美好的早晨啊！

translation.en: [Shola] That's it. Make it good.
translation.zh: 没错 一定要过得精彩

translation.en: One of my dear friends is the hilarious and great Patton Oswalt.
translation.zh: 我的一位挚友是搞笑又优秀的帕顿奥斯瓦尔特

translation.en: -He happens to be in Philadelphia. -[Patton] Oh my God. Come here.
translation.zh: -他碰巧在费城-天哪 来吧

translation.en: [Phil] And I'm taking him to one of the best restaurants in Philly.
translation.zh: 我要带他去费城最好的餐厅之一

translation.en: In fact, it was just put on The New York Times' "50 Best in America."
translation.zh: 其实这家餐厅刚刚登上了《纽约时报》的“美国50强”

translation.en: This is Laser Wolf,
translation.zh: 就是镭射沃尔夫 我朋友

translation.en: owned by my buddy, the great James Beard Award-winning chef, Michael Solomonov.
translation.zh: 厉害的詹姆斯比尔德基金会奖获奖厨师迈克尔索洛莫诺夫开的

translation.en: His head chef here at Laser Wolf is Andrew Henshaw.
translation.zh: 镭射沃尔夫的主厨是安德鲁亨肖

translation.en: [Andrew] How's it going? -Oh, hello! -What?
translation.zh: -近来如何？-你好！

translation.en: [Phil] You're about to have the world's best pita. Look, here we go.
translation.zh: 你将吃到世界上最美味的皮塔饼 这是…我们开始吧

translation.en: [Andrew] We have all of our salatim.
translation.zh: 这是一整套的萨拉蒂姆

translation.en: Salatim, this is called.
translation.zh: 这叫萨拉蒂姆

translation.en: It's called "salatin"?
translation.zh: 这叫“萨兰汀”？

translation.en: -Salatim. -With an "M," salatim.
translation.zh: -萨拉蒂姆-是“姆” 萨拉蒂姆

translation.en: [Patton] Okay. Salatim.
translation.zh: 好 萨拉蒂姆

translation.en: [Andrew] We have some Napa cabbage, a nice bean salad with some olives…
translation.zh: 里面有一些大白菜美味豆子沙拉配橄榄…

translation.en: [Patton] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Red cabbage, some seared fennel with sumac red onions.
translation.zh: 紫甘蓝、烤茴香配盐肤木红洋葱

translation.en: -Oh. -Eggplant baba ghanoush.
translation.zh: 中东茄子泥

translation.en: Seared mushrooms and then just roasted celery root.
translation.zh: 烤蘑菇和烤芹菜根

translation.en: -Can I just get a shrimp cocktail? -[Phil laughs]
translation.zh: 能给我来一杯鸡尾酒虾吗？

translation.en: I'll see what we can do. I don't know, though.
translation.zh: 我来一杯鸡尾酒虾

translation.en: We're trying to keep kosher here.
translation.zh: 我们要尽力遵守犹太洁食…

translation.en: A bowl of mixed nuts and a shrimp cocktail will be fine, thank you.
translation.zh: 一碗混合坚果和一杯鸡尾酒虾就好了

translation.en: [Phil] Choose your weapon.
translation.zh: -你们选吧-谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you, my boy. -Look at these! Thank you! Oh, look.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 我的兄弟-看看啊！谢谢！

translation.en: -[Patton] Wait. -[Phil] Little pillows.
translation.zh: 像小枕头一样

translation.en: -My God, if I fell asleep with this scent… -Yes.
translation.zh: 天哪 要是我闻着这种香味入睡…

translation.en: -This should be a candle scent. -Yes.
translation.zh: 这应该是香氛蜡烛的气味 对 新鲜的皮塔饼我应该喷这种香水 这样掰开

translation.en: -Fresh pita. Oh good lord. -It should be my cologne. Here, do that.
translation.zh: 对 新鲜的皮塔饼我应该喷这种香水 这样掰开

translation.en: -Wipe it like a… Yeah. -A little.
translation.zh: -像这样抹一下-抹一点

translation.en: Oh yeah. Get 'em all. Get 'em all.
translation.zh: 全都抹上

translation.en: -[Patton] I wanna try some of this. -Yes.
translation.zh: -我想尝尝这个-好

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吃 我觉得对很多美国人来说

translation.en: Okay. Israeli cooking is, I think for a lot of Americans,
translation.zh: 好吃 我觉得对很多美国人来说 以色列料理是一种异国风味所以一定要做得很完美

translation.en: probably feels pretty exotic, so you've really gotta nail it.
translation.zh: 以色列料理是一种异国风味所以一定要做得很完美

translation.en: Yeah, but you know what?
translation.zh: 对 但是你知道吗？不存在以色列烹饪或料理

translation.en: There's no such thing as Israeli cooking or cuisine.
translation.zh: 对 但是你知道吗？不存在以色列烹饪或料理 这种说法

translation.en: It's a mishmash of everything from that area. Right.
translation.zh: -而是那片地区一切烹饪的大杂烩-好

translation.en: So, are there regional differences that some people can spot
translation.zh: 那在这种烹饪中人们会不会发现地区差异

translation.en: and prefer in this kind of cooking?
translation.zh: 有自己的偏好呢？

translation.en: There are hummus wars.
translation.zh: 有鹰嘴豆泥战争

translation.en: [laughs] Hummus wars?
translation.zh: 鹰嘴豆泥战争？

translation.en: -"That's not the best hummus. This is." -Oh really?
translation.zh: -“那不是最好吃的鹰嘴豆泥”-真的吗？

translation.en: "The Syrian hummus is the…" You know, "The Lebanese is the best."
translation.zh: “叙利亚鹰嘴豆泥…”“不 黎巴嫩鹰嘴豆泥最好吃”

translation.en: Oh, what are these?
translation.zh: -这是什么？-这其实是法式炸薯条

translation.en: -[Andrew] These are called french fries. -Really?
translation.zh: -这是什么？-这其实是法式炸薯条 -真的吗？法式炸薯条-法式炸…

translation.en: -"French fry…" -[Phil] French fries.
translation.zh: -真的吗？法式炸薯条-法式炸…

translation.en: [Patton] So there's a French influence over in Israel, would you say?
translation.zh: 这么说以色列受到了法国影响你觉得呢？

translation.en: -And then we have tehina ketchup here. -I'm learning so much.
translation.zh: 这是中东烤芝麻番茄酱

translation.en: It's gonna have our favorite thing, amba, tehina,
translation.zh: 里面有我们最喜欢的酱料安巴酱、中东烤芝麻酱

translation.en: and then just some Heinz 57.
translation.zh: 然后有亨氏57番茄酱

translation.en: -That makes… -[Patton] There you go.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: -That's what makes it special. -[Phil] That makes it theirs, yeah. [Patton] Yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -这就是它的特别之处-这就是他们餐厅的独特之处 没错

translation.en: I love turning Patton on to food because, you know, he's Remy from Ratatouille.
translation.zh: 我喜欢勾起帕顿对美食的兴趣因为他是《美食总动员》里的米小鼠

translation.en: So, were you already familiar
translation.zh: 在给《美食总动员》配音之前

translation.en: and friendly with four-star dining before Ratatouille?
translation.zh: 你是否已经是四星级餐厅的常客了？

translation.en: No, not really. I mean,
translation.zh: 不 并不是 我是说…

translation.en: I knew a couple of restaurants I liked, 'cause then, as I started touring
translation.zh: 我知道几家我喜欢的餐厅但是我一开始和其他人

translation.en: and traveling with other people and…
translation.zh: 巡演和旅行时…

translation.en: Especially, you know who really knows good restaurants? Rock bands.
translation.zh: 你知道哪些人尤其熟悉好餐厅吗？摇滚乐队

translation.en: I became really good friends with the guys from Anthrax.
translation.zh: 我和炭疽乐队的人成为了好朋友

translation.en: And those guys… Scott Ian is the biggest wine snob.
translation.zh: 这些人…史考特伊恩最喜欢品葡萄酒

translation.en: -Knows everything about wine-- -The guy from Anthrax?
translation.zh: -他了解葡萄酒的一切…-炭疽乐队的吗？

translation.en: Anthrax. I've been dining with him, where he's like,
translation.zh: 炭疽乐队 我之前和他一起吃饭 他说

translation.en: [deep voice] "This Nebbiolo is too big for the veal. I have to send that back."
translation.zh: “内比奥罗对小牛肉来说有点大材小用 我必须退回去”

translation.en: -And he's right. -[Phil chuckles]
translation.zh: 他说得对

translation.en: -And then he goes onstage and… [screams] -[mimics metal vocals] Yeah.
translation.zh: 然后他上台… 没错 他知道 所以…

translation.en: -He just knows… -[laughs]
translation.zh: 没错 他知道 所以…

translation.en: Because, like, if I'm gonna travel, I'm gonna make it pleasant for myself.
translation.zh: 因为如果我要旅行的话我会让自己尽情享受

translation.en: I'm gonna make it a fun adventure, so--
translation.zh: 我会让它成为一次有趣的冒险 所以…

translation.en: -That's what I do. -They introduced me to the idea of,
translation.zh: -我就是这样-他们给我灌输了这个想法

translation.en: "If you are gonna go out and eat, make it count." But it took me a while to do that.
translation.zh: “如果要出去吃 就吃好点”我花了一段时间才做到

translation.en: -Look who's here. -[man] How are you, man?
translation.zh: 看看谁来了 你好吗 兄弟？

translation.en: [Phil] You might remember my friend Michael Solomonov from our Tel Aviv episode.
translation.zh: 你可能还记得在特拉维夫那一集中我的朋友迈克尔索洛莫诺夫

translation.en: -It's been a while. -It's been too long.
translation.zh: -好久不见-太久了

translation.en: It's so good to have you in our fair city.
translation.zh: 你来到我们美丽的城市真好

translation.en: -Have a seat. -I'm gonna hang, yeah. Is that cool?
translation.zh: -坐下吧-我要跟你们一起 可以吗？

translation.en: -[Michael] Chef Andrew, what do we got? -Our whole branzino,
translation.zh: -安德鲁主厨 这是什么？-整条欧洲鲈鱼

translation.en: tomato, ginger, caraway, a bunch of nice tasty stuff.
translation.zh: 里面有番茄、生姜、葛缕子干籽一堆美味的食材

translation.en: -[Patton] Wow. -[Andrew] Over here, all from the grill.
translation.zh: -哇-还有这边 都是刚烤出来的我们的伊朗碎牛羊肉烤串

translation.en: We have our lamb and beef koobideh,
translation.zh: 都是刚烤出来的我们的伊朗碎牛羊肉烤串

translation.en: beets, which have been salt-baked, smoked, glazed, and grilled,
translation.zh: 甜菜根经过盐烤、熏制、上色和火烤

translation.en: and then our chicken shashlik, which is with guava, onions, and garlic.
translation.zh: 还有烤鸡肉扦串配上番石榴、洋葱和大蒜

translation.en: Then some caramelized onions and tehina.
translation.zh: 然后把洋葱和芝麻酱炒成焦糖色

translation.en: [Patton] Look at Phil's face. He's so happy right now.
translation.zh: 看看菲尔 他现在好开心

translation.en: [Michael] Thank you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: I'm with two of my favorite people, eating some of the best food in the world.
translation.zh: 身边有两个我最喜欢的人吃着一些世界上最好的美食

translation.en: We're laughing how you brought this exotic food, and we keep jumping back into the fries.
translation.zh: 你带来了异国风味的食物大杂烩但我们一直都在吃回薯条

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Michael] That's the problem. The french fries are so freakin' good, right?
translation.zh: 这就是问题所在薯条太好吃了 对吧？

translation.en: I like to go…
translation.zh: 我喜欢…

translation.en: -I like to do a little of this action. -Oh, look at him!
translation.zh: -我喜欢这样做-看他！

translation.en: -[Patton] What? -[Phil] Chef hack.
translation.zh: -不是吧？-主厨黑客

translation.en: [Michael] Yeah, chef hack. This is my jawn.
translation.zh: 没错 主厨黑客 这是我的玩意儿

translation.en: What does "jawn" mean?
translation.zh: 什么是“玩意儿”？

translation.en: "Jawn" is anything. It's like a subject.
translation.zh: “玩意儿”可以是任何东西这个概念比较虚

translation.en: -It can be whatever. -J-A-W-N?
translation.zh: -可以是任何东西-玩意儿？

translation.en: J-A-W-N. It means like, "Pass me that jawn," is like "Pass me the pita."
translation.zh: 玩意儿 “把那个玩意儿递给我”就是“递给我那个皮塔饼”

translation.en: -You know? I just-- -Oh.
translation.zh: 其实 我就…

translation.en: How old do you have to be to use this expression?
translation.zh: 你得多大年纪才能说这个词？

translation.en: I think that whenever you want, you know. You have literary license here.
translation.zh: 我觉得可以随时用这里允许变通文学手法

translation.en: Yeah, but there are certain things that, if you're over 50, you can't say.
translation.zh: 但是有些词超过50岁就不能说

translation.en: I think if you're over 50, saying "it slaps"
translation.zh: 我觉得如果你已经50多岁然后说“真不戳”

translation.en: -just doesn't come out correctly. -[Phil laughs]
translation.zh: 真的就感觉怪怪的

translation.en: You know? And I see people on Twitter doing it. And it's like,
translation.zh: 我看到人们在推特上这么说心里就想

translation.en: "Dude, no."
translation.zh: “伙计 不要”

translation.en: If you're over 50 and something slaps, you better see a doctor.
translation.zh: 如果你50多岁 身体出了差错你要去看医生

translation.en: If you went to the bathroom and it slaps, "I have to go to the gastroenterologist."
translation.zh: 你跑去卫生间 菊花像被戳破一样那要去看肠胃科医生

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Patton laughs]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Phil] Monica and I love the arts,
translation.zh: 我和莫妮卡都热爱艺术

translation.en: and I wanted to bring her to a place she'd never been, even though she's from Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 我想带她去一个她从未见过的地方尽管她在费城长大

translation.en: Philadelphia's Magic Gardens.
translation.zh: 费城的魔法花园

translation.en: I can't believe I never even heard of it.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我从没听说过

translation.en: -What kind of Philadelphian are you? -I know, right?
translation.zh: -那你还算什么费城人？-我知道

translation.en: -Hi! Allison, right? -[Allison] Hi! Welcome!
translation.zh: -嗨！是艾莉森吧？-嗨！欢迎你们！

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Phil. -Welcome to Magic Gardens.
translation.zh: -我是菲尔-欢迎来到魔法花园

translation.en: -Thank you. That's Monica, my magic wife. -[Monica chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢 这是莫妮卡 我的魔法妻子

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -[Phil] What a beautiful place.
translation.zh: 这地方真美

translation.en: -[Phil] This way? -[Allison] Yes, right on in here.
translation.zh: -这边？-对 继续往里面走

translation.en: Right away, we're on theme with the show. We've got plates.
translation.zh: 我们马上点到了节目的主题 盘子

translation.en: -That's right. Lots of serving ware here. -Bottles.
translation.zh: -没错 这里有很多餐具-瓶子

translation.en: -Yep. -Wow. Look how gorgeous.
translation.zh: 哇 看看多么美

translation.en: -[Monica] Oh, it's so nice. -[Allison] Yeah.
translation.zh: -没错-太好了

translation.en: So, this is about 3,000 square feet of mosaic work,
translation.zh: 这是大约280平方米的马赛克镶嵌画

translation.en: all created by one man named Isaiah Zagar.
translation.zh: -好-都是由艾赛亚扎加完成的

translation.en: He started on this site in 1991,
translation.zh: 他从1991年开始在这里创作

translation.en: worked on this over the past 30 so years, so it's pretty cool.
translation.zh: 在过去的30年里不断完善所以非常酷

translation.en: -Did he take time to do anything else? -[chuckles] -No. -Or was he just obsessed?
translation.zh: 他有没有花时间做别的事还是他一心都在做这件事？

translation.en: -He eats, sleeps, and breathes mosaics. -Did he have an amazing wife? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他吃饭、睡觉还有呼吸

translation.en: So beautiful.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: -[Phil] I bet little kids love this. -[Allison] Oh yeah.
translation.zh: -小孩子肯定很喜欢-没错

translation.en: [Monica] Gosh! Can you imagine what kids do when they go home?
translation.zh: 天哪！想想孩子们回家后会做什么

translation.en: -[Allison] Oh, I know. -[Monica] "Mom, say bye to this plate!"
translation.zh: -我知道！-他们说：“妈妈 跟这个盘子告别！”

translation.en: Yeah, Mom's like, "Where's my makeup case?" "Oh, I cemented it in the backyard."
translation.zh: 没错 妈妈说：“我的化妆箱在哪？”“对了 我用水泥封在后院了”

translation.en: We wanted to meet the artist from the Magic Gardens, Isaiah Zagar.
translation.zh: 我们想见见魔法花园的艺术家艾赛亚扎加

translation.en: I asked him what his favorite place was and he said "South Philly Barbacoa."
translation.zh: 我问他最喜欢的地方是哪他说：“费城南部烧烤”

translation.en: We were at your beautiful creation yesterday.
translation.zh: 我们昨天去看了你的美丽作品

translation.en: -You mean the Philadelphia Magic Gardens? -[Phil] That's it.
translation.zh: -你是说费城魔法花园？-没错

translation.en: Oh yeah, I know that place.
translation.zh: 是啊 我知道那个地方

translation.en: [Monica] Boy. It was our first time.
translation.zh: 哎呀 那是我们第一次去

translation.en: I can't believe I'm from outside of Philly and I had never been there.
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信来自费城郊外的我竟然从没去过那里

translation.en: Like a crazy woman.
translation.zh: 就像一个疯女人

translation.en: It used to be the best-kept secret in Philadelphia, but it's not a secret anymore.
translation.zh: 那里曾经是费城保守最好的秘密但现在不再是了

translation.en: -Not anymore. -What a legacy you've left on this city.
translation.zh: 那里曾经是费城保守最好的秘密但现在不再是了 你在这座城市留下了如此宝贵的遗产

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.zh: 现在还不算是呢

translation.en: -[chuckles] -I wanna stay around a while.
translation.zh: 我还想多活几年

translation.en: And the chef-owner of South Philly Barbacoa is Cristina Martinez.
translation.zh: 费城南部烧烤的主厨兼老板是克里斯蒂娜马丁内斯

translation.en: Cristina is a Mexican immigrant who went from selling food out of her tiny apartment
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜是墨西哥移民从在小公寓卖食物

translation.en: to owning one of Philly's most popular restaurants.
translation.zh: 到现在拥有最受欢迎的餐厅之一

translation.en: Cristina, we were reading all about you.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜 我们刚在看你的资料

translation.en: When you were cooking just in your apartment and doing takeout from your apartment.
translation.zh: 你在公寓里做菜只做外卖的那段时间

translation.en: -Yeah? -That's when you met Isaiah?
translation.zh: -嗯？-你在那时认识了艾赛亚？

translation.en: -[Isaiah] No! Before that. -[Phil] What happened before that?
translation.zh: -不！在那之前-之前发生什么了？

translation.en: She was delivering food to workers that I had in my studio.
translation.zh: 她当时给我工作室里的工作人员送饭

translation.en: [Phil] Right.
translation.zh: 我觉得她是个很棒的女人

translation.en: -I thought, "This is an amazing woman." -[Phil] Yes.
translation.zh: 我觉得她是个很棒的女人 -是吗？-然后我和她失联了十年

translation.en: -Then I lost track of her for ten years. -[Phil and Monica exclaim]
translation.zh: -是吗？-然后我和她失联了十年

translation.en: [in Spanish] Over ten.
translation.zh: 不止十年

translation.en: And then, I was standing outside the Magic Garden.
translation.zh: 然后 我当时正站在魔法花园外面

translation.en: -[Phil] Yeah. -And this woman jumps off the bicycle
translation.zh: 这个女人从自行车上跳下来

translation.en: and hugs and kisses me, and she says she's doing very well.
translation.zh: 拥抱并亲吻我 说自己过得很好

translation.en: And I think, "Who the heck was that?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“这人到底是谁？”

translation.en: But women are kissing you all the time, aren't they?
translation.zh: 但总是有女人亲你 对吗？

translation.en: -Not all the time. I would like it more. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 并非一直都是 我希望自己多多被亲

translation.en: -Might get extra today if you're lucky. -[Monica] I think it's happening.
translation.zh: 如果运气好的话你今天可能会多收到一份香吻

translation.en: -Monica, how great is this? -Oh my God, I love it.
translation.zh: -莫妮卡 好吃吗？-天哪 我很喜欢

translation.en: Boy, the flavor of that broth is crazy good, right? [Phil] Mm!
translation.zh: -汤的味道好极了-嗯！

translation.en: [Phil] Cristina met her husband and co-owner Ben Miller
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂娜遇到了她的丈夫兼合伙人本米勒

translation.en: when they worked in another Philly kitchen until word got out she was undocumented.
translation.zh: 那时他们在费城的另一家餐厅工作直到有消息传出她是无证移民

translation.en: The owner fired her on the spot, but that experience solidified her commitment
translation.zh: 老板当场解雇了她但这增强了她的决心

translation.en: to not only go out on our own but to fight for the rights of undocumented workers.
translation.zh: 不仅要开展自己的事业还要为无证劳动者的权利而战

translation.en: [Phil] So we can add bravery to the list of her more obvious talents.
translation.zh: 所以除了她那更明显的才华外她还拥有勇气

translation.en: Now, they say this one is spicy. Should I do it?
translation.zh: 他们说这个很辣 我要不要吃？

translation.en: Man, that's good.
translation.zh: 天哪 真好吃

translation.en: You know, I get free food forever.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我可以永远免费吃

translation.en: -Here? -Forever, yeah.
translation.zh: -这里吗？-没错 永远都是

translation.en: -People, this is why you become an artist. -And she's younger than me.
translation.zh: -所以才要当艺术家啊-而且她比我年轻

translation.en: -[Monica laughs] -So forever means forever.
translation.zh: 所以她说的永远就意味着永永远远

translation.en: [Cristina] How's everything? [Phil] You know how everything is? It's phenomenal.
translation.zh: -一切都好吗 艾赛亚？-你知道一切怎么样吗？了不起

translation.en: -[Cristina] It's good? Okay. -We love it.
translation.zh: -好吃吗？-我们很喜欢

translation.en: I love it so much. It's a beautiful thing.
translation.zh: 我好喜欢 简直太美好了

translation.en: But I'm so impressed with you
translation.zh: 但是你和你的旅程

translation.en: and your journey, and you… to me, you are America.
translation.zh: 让我很是钦佩对我来说 你就是美国人

translation.en: You are why America is great.
translation.zh: 你就是美国伟大的原因

translation.en: -[Isaiah] Bravo. -Yes. I really believe that.
translation.zh: -太棒了-没错 我真这么觉得

translation.en: And the two of you… You too, Isaiah.
translation.zh: 而且你们两人 还有你 艾赛亚

translation.en: You're both nourishing the soul
translation.zh: 你们两个都在滋养人的灵魂

translation.en: and I just… I'm so proud to be here with you both.
translation.zh: 所以见到你们两个 我真心感到骄傲

translation.en: So I just want to say that.
translation.zh: 我只想这么说

translation.en: -[Isaiah] Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢-不 是我要说谢谢

translation.en: [in Spanish] Thank you very much. We are both strong artists.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你我们俩都有生命力的艺术家

translation.en: -I'll need some subtitles. -Enjoy, guys. I gotta go. Come back, okay?
translation.zh: -谁给我翻译一下-各位慢用 我得走了 一定要再来

translation.en: -[Cristina] Okay. -Thank you. What a sweetie.
translation.zh: -谢谢 她真好-天哪

translation.en: -[Monica] Oh my God. -[Phil] How great is she?
translation.zh: -谢谢 她真好-天哪 她真的好棒

translation.en: Can I tell you what a pleasure it's been to meet you?
translation.zh: 我能告诉你 我见到你有多开心吗？

translation.en: -[Isaiah] You're different than I thought. -[Phil] What did you think?
translation.zh: -你跟我想的很不一样-你是怎么想的？

translation.en: I didn't think anything because I didn't watch the television program.
translation.zh: 我什么都没想 我没有看你的节目

translation.en: -Give him a kiss. -[Monica] Oh my God.
translation.zh: -给他一个吻-天哪

translation.en: [Monica] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[Isaiah] She's a handful. -[Monica laughs]
translation.zh: 她有点难搞

translation.en: Bye, Isaiah.
translation.zh: 再见 艾赛亚

translation.en: [Phil] We're going to Wissahickon Valley Park with my buddy, Michael Solomonov,
translation.zh: 我们要和我的朋友迈克尔索洛莫诺夫去维萨希肯山谷公园

translation.en: and we're doing this.
translation.zh: 而且我们要这样去

translation.en: -How are you? -Are you a rider? Do you do this?
translation.zh: -你好吗？-你会骑马吗？你平常骑马吗？

translation.en: So, I just… No.
translation.zh: 我只是…不

translation.en: -[Phil] Really? -Are you ready? Yeah. So, here we go.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？-好了 我们开始吧

translation.en: -This is… an episode of Jews on Horseback. -Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -这集叫《马背上的犹太人》-没错

translation.en: -Look at this. What's her name? -Bridget.
translation.zh: -看这匹 它叫什么名字？-布莉吉特

translation.en: Bridget. Is Bridget for me?
translation.zh: 布莉吉特 它是为我安排的吗？

translation.en: Bridget is for you.
translation.zh: 是为你安排的

translation.en: Hi, Bridget.
translation.zh: 嗨 布莉吉特

translation.en: Oh, what a sweetie pie.
translation.zh: 真是小甜心

translation.en: [woman 1] First, we find a helmet to fit your head.
translation.zh: 首先 我们需要找一个适合你头部的头盔

translation.en: Feels small.
translation.zh: 感觉有点小

translation.en: That's it. Now we're talking.
translation.zh: 好了 这才像话嘛

translation.en: [woman 1] And then we'll get you on.
translation.zh: 然后我们帮你上马

translation.en: I like a staircase to a horse.
translation.zh: 我喜欢踩着阶梯上马

translation.en: There are some people, like cowboys, who don't need the staircase.
translation.zh: 有些人不需要阶梯 比如牛仔

translation.en: -We're not cowboys, though. -[Phil] You're right.
translation.zh: -但我们不是牛仔-你说得对

translation.en: [woman 2] Jump and swing your right leg over. Jump and swing.
translation.zh: -现在向上跃起 把右腿绕过去-跃起 绕过去

translation.en: [Michael] Nice mount.
translation.zh: 很帅的上马姿势

translation.en: -It's the dismount that I worry about. -[Michael chuckles] Yeah!
translation.zh: -我担心怎么下马-对！

translation.en: Good morning. -I'm on a horse. -[Michael chuckles]
translation.zh: 早上好 我在骑马

translation.en: [Phil] Oh, I love that horse, Bridget.
translation.zh: 我喜欢那匹马 布莉吉特

translation.en: These two seem like the sweetest, most gentle…
translation.zh: 这两匹马看来是最贴心、最温顺的…

translation.en: Ooh, careful, honey.
translation.zh: 小心点 亲爱的

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -No.
translation.zh: -你要去哪？-不！

translation.en: -[Michael] Bridget. -[Phil] She is not happy.
translation.zh: -布莉吉特！-它不太高兴

translation.en: [Michael] Come on. Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 拜托 好吧 那就这样

translation.en: [Phil] This is… She wants to go where she wants. Where do you wanna go, sweetie?
translation.zh: -它想去哪就去哪-你想去哪 亲爱的？

translation.en: You know where she wanted to go?
translation.zh: 你知道它刚才想去哪吗？

translation.en: -[music continues] -[car horns honking]
translation.zh: （达莱桑德罗的店牛排、啤酒、特大号三明治）

translation.en: Beautiful job, Bridget.
translation.zh: 好样的 布莉吉特

translation.en: [Michael] Good job.
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: This is honestly my favorite horse.
translation.zh: 这真的是我最喜欢的一匹马

translation.en: She took me to Dalessandro's. I mean, that's a horse!
translation.zh: 它把我带到了达莱桑德罗的店它就只是一匹马

translation.en: Right?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: The navigation system on my car is not as good as Bridget.
translation.zh: 我车上的导航系统都没有布莉吉特这么厉害

translation.en: [Phil] And there it is.
translation.zh: 就在那里

translation.en: Thinly-sliced beef with cheese and your choice of other stuff
translation.zh: 薄切牛肉配奶酪以及你选择的其他食材

translation.en: on a long soft roll.
translation.zh: 一同放在长长的软面包上

translation.en: This is the world-famous Philly cheesesteak.
translation.zh: 这是举世闻名的费城牛肉奶酪三明治

translation.en: -[Michael] So… -Let's start with the classic, yes?
translation.zh: -我们先从经典口味开始-看起来不错

translation.en: -[Michael] Yeah, let's do it. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们先从经典口味开始-看起来不错 对

translation.en: -Yeah, why don't you dress it a bit? -[Michael] You want a little?
translation.zh: -不如你来加点酱？-来一点吗？

translation.en: See how it smells.
translation.zh: 闻闻这味道

translation.en: When you come to Philly, are you like, "I have to get a cheesesteak"?
translation.zh: 如果来到费城 是不是一定要吃费城牛肉奶酪三明治？

translation.en: -Of course. Yes! -Mm.
translation.zh: 当然 太好了！

translation.en: Man, the rolls too, are so good. They're lighter than air, you know?
translation.zh: 天哪 面包也很好吃 比空气还轻

translation.en: So soft, so delicious.
translation.zh: 好软 好美味

translation.en: There are a lot of great cheesesteaks in this town. Right? It's what we do, but…
translation.zh: 这里有很多好吃的牛肉奶酪三明治这是我们的看家本领 但…

translation.en: None better.
translation.zh: 没有更好吃的了

translation.en: I mean, everyone's got their own vibe and this is so different
translation.zh: 每家店都有自己的风格与你在城市里

translation.en: than the ones that you get in the city.
translation.zh: 吃到的三明治感觉很不同

translation.en: -[Michael] It's good. -Yes?
translation.zh: -好吃吗？-好吃

translation.en: You wanna try that?
translation.zh: 你想尝尝吗？

translation.en: [Richard] My God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: -[Richard] As she throws up all over you. -[Michael] Judgy. Yeah.
translation.zh: -它会给你捣乱-真挑剔 好吧

translation.en: -She wants to check it out. -[Michael] She was in there.
translation.zh: -它就想看看-它嘴巴都凑过去了

translation.en: I feel like the onions are gonna make our horses run away though.
translation.zh: 我觉得洋葱味会把我们的马赶跑

translation.en: We're gonna be, like, hitchhiking back to the park.
translation.zh: 我们得搭便车回公园了

translation.en: [Phil] The meat in that cheesesteak is a rib eye.
translation.zh: 牛肉奶酪三明治的肉是肋眼

translation.en: [Michael] Awesome, rib eye.
translation.zh: 太棒了 肋眼

translation.en: [Phil] Every other ingredient is great.
translation.zh: 所有其他食材都很棒

translation.en: They even make the Whiz taste good.
translation.zh: 甚至让奶酪酱尝起来都变得美味了

translation.en: [Michael] Not an easy thing to do.
translation.zh: 这可不是件容易的事

translation.en: It slaps. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 真不戳

translation.en: -[laughs] -It slaps. I said it right in context, everybody.
translation.zh: -真不戳-我用对语境了 各位

translation.en: [Phil] But Philly's no one-sandwich town.
translation.zh: 但费城不是只有一种三明治

translation.en: While they also make an award-winning cheesesteak,
translation.zh: 在做一流的牛肉奶酪三明治的同时

translation.en: the specialty of one of my favorite places is right there in the name.
translation.zh: 我最爱的一家餐厅的特色菜就在它的名字里

translation.en: There's a classic institution here in Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 费城有一家经典的餐厅

translation.en: It's called John's Roast Pork, and I've been coming here for many years.
translation.zh: 叫做约翰烤猪肉多年来 我一直光顾这里

translation.en: And to help me today, is my old friend
translation.zh: 今天给我帮忙的是我的老朋友

translation.en: Stephen Nathan, who was a writer with me on Raymond at the beginning,
translation.zh: 斯蒂芬内森 我们最开始都是《人人都爱雷蒙德》的编剧

translation.en: and, as a young actor, appeared in the movie version of the musical 1776,
translation.zh: 他年轻时曾出演了音乐剧《1776》的电影版本

translation.en: which was set in revolutionary-era Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 故事就发生在革命年代的费城

translation.en: [Phil] And he's back!
translation.zh: 他回来了！

translation.en: -[Phil chuckles] -Oh my God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: -I got you a sandwich… or two. -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -我给你买了一两个三明治-天哪

translation.en: -[Phil] Yes. This is good. -All right. Is it enough?
translation.zh: -太好了-好 够不够？

translation.en: -I'm gonna go with roast pork first. -I'm going roast pork too.
translation.zh: -我要先吃夹烤猪肉的-我也是

translation.en: -[Phil] We can cut it if you want. -I don't think we should cut it.
translation.zh: 你要是想 我们可以切开 我觉得不应该切开这是人与肉之间的较量

translation.en: I think the whole thing is… It's man against meat.
translation.zh: 我觉得不应该切开这是人与肉之间的较量

translation.en: Oh, you go from the top down.
translation.zh: 你从上往下吃

translation.en: I'm eating it like an ear of corn.
translation.zh: 我像啃玉米棒那样吃

translation.en: You're way more animal than I am.
translation.zh: 你比我更野蛮

translation.en: I keep eating. What's wrong with me, people?
translation.zh: 我一直在吃 我是怎么了？

translation.en: Well, this is delicious.
translation.zh: 真好吃

translation.en: [Phil] It actually gets more delicious as you keep eating.
translation.zh: 其实 你越吃越觉得好吃

translation.en: [Phil] But there's one more stop on the Philadelphia sandwich trail.
translation.zh: 但我的费城三明治旅途还有一站

translation.en: What you might know as a sub or a hero is called a hoagie here.
translation.zh: 你所知道的潜艇三明治或英雄三明治在这里叫特大号三明治

translation.en: Joe Beddia already has the number-one pizza place in town,
translation.zh: 乔巴迪亚已经开了这里最好的披萨店

translation.en: and tonight we're going to his exclusive Hoagie Omakase room.
translation.zh: 今晚我们要去他的特大号三明治无菜单独家料理屋

translation.en: Omakase, for those of you who don't know, means "chef's choice" in Japanese
translation.zh: 无菜单料理在日语中的意思是“主厨的选择”

translation.en: and I think this is the first time it's been applied to hoagies.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是这个词首次被运用在特大号三明治上

translation.en: First up, a roasted vegetable hoagie with Philly's favorite cheese, provolone.
translation.zh: 首先是烤蔬菜特大号三明治 配上费城人最爱的奶酪普罗沃洛内奶酪

translation.en: This is gorgeous.
translation.zh: 这太棒了

translation.en: -I'm not trying to reinvent anything. -[Phil] Yes.
translation.zh: -我不是想重新发明什么…-真好吃！

translation.en: [Joe] So when I use great cheese and a great extra virgin olive oil,
translation.zh: 所以当我用上好的奶酪和优质特级初榨橄榄油时

translation.en: all those things, they follow the path but make it my own.
translation.zh: 所有东西都应该遵循这个原则 但我要让它具有个人特色

translation.en: -Is that a tuna? -[chef] Absolutely.
translation.zh: -那是金枪鱼吗？-当然

translation.en: -Oh man! -[chef] You are correct.
translation.zh: -天哪！-你说得对

translation.en: [Joe] And this one is Italian tuna
translation.zh: 这是来自缅因州巴港的

translation.en: and smoked sardines from Bar Harbor, Maine.
translation.zh: 意大利金枪鱼和烟熏沙丁鱼

translation.en: [Phil] Oh my God.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: That's a tuna hoagie. Come on!
translation.zh: 这是金枪鱼特大号三明治 开吃！

translation.en: This is an incredible hoagie.
translation.zh: 这个特大号三明治真是神奇

translation.en: [Phil] And finally, smoked ham.
translation.zh: 最后是烟熏火腿

translation.en: [Phil] Oh, sandwich. I love you.
translation.zh: 三明治 我爱你

translation.en: Today, I'm going to a pasta bar set in a 125-year-old building
translation.zh: 今天我要去一家意大利面食吧 它位于一座拥有125年历史的建筑里

translation.en: that used to be a sausage place.
translation.zh: 它位于一座拥有125年历史的建筑里 以前是一家香肠店

translation.en: It's run by my friend Marc Vetri, acclaimed chef, Philadelphia native,
translation.zh: 由我的朋友马克维特瑞经营他是一位备受赞誉的主厨 费城本地人

translation.en: and co-owner of several of the city's most revered restaurants.
translation.zh: 也是本市几家最受尊崇的餐厅的合伙人

translation.en: -[Phil] How are you? -I'm great. How are you?
translation.zh: -你好吗？-很好 你好吗？

translation.en: -I'm gonna eat a lot. -Enjoy.
translation.zh: -我要吃很多-祝你用餐愉快

translation.en: Oh, I'm very happy.
translation.zh: 我很开心

translation.en: You're happy? I'm happy. Dude, it's so good to see you.
translation.zh: 你开心吗？我很开心伙计 见到你真是太好了

translation.en: [Phil] And I'm meeting someone who's near and dear to both of us, Liz Scott.
translation.zh: 我要见一位跟我俩都很亲近的好友莉兹斯科特

translation.en: We'll tell you more about Liz in a minute.
translation.zh: 我们等下再告诉你更多关于莉兹的事

translation.en: And, let me tell you something, when the article came out
translation.zh: 我告诉你一件事 那篇文章面世后

translation.en: that saved our life. That saved our restaurant.
translation.zh: 它救了我们的命 拯救了我们的餐厅

translation.en: To hear that it had an impact is incredibly gratifying.
translation.zh: 听到文章有如此大的影响力我真是非常高兴

translation.en: -[Nok] Huge. -That means so much, yeah.
translation.zh: -影响巨大-意义重大

translation.en: -[Phil] That's wonderful. Whoa! -[Kevin] Look at this.
translation.zh: -太棒了-看看这个

translation.en: I'm actually really happy for you because you get to have your mind blown right now.
translation.zh: 我真的为你感到高兴因为你马上要大开眼界了

translation.en: -This is… [speaks Thai] -[Phil] Little bite-size things.
translation.zh: -这是…-一口能吃掉的小东西

translation.en: [Phil] Oh! What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: The bird dumpling.
translation.zh: 鸟型饺子

translation.en: Bird dum… So… Oh yes, look.
translation.zh: 鸟型饺…太好了 你看

translation.en: -[Phil] Oh my God, is that sweet! -[Jeff] Isn't that incredible?
translation.zh: 天哪 真是太棒了 是不是很厉害？

translation.en: [Phil] Look at that.
translation.zh: 看那个

translation.en: [Phil] Look at the work that goes into this.
translation.zh: 看看制作过程

translation.en: This is a person who is taking every single dumpling
translation.zh: 这个人把每个饺子

translation.en: and crimping the sides so it looks like the feathers of a bird
translation.zh: 都压好边 这样看起来像鸟的羽毛

translation.en: and then makes the little neck
translation.zh: 然后捏出小脖子

translation.en: and then makes the little beak out of a tiny piece of red pepper
translation.zh: 再用一小片红辣椒当做小喙

translation.en: and then the little seeds that they use as the eyes.
translation.zh: 接下来用小种子当做眼睛

translation.en: This is labor-intensive stuff.
translation.zh: 这是一种费工夫的美食

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 老天爷啊

translation.en: It's not God, Phil. It's me.
translation.zh: 这不是老天爷的功劳 菲尔 是我的

translation.en: -I did this. It's not God. -[Jeff and Kevin chuckle]
translation.zh: 这是我做的 不是老天爷做的

translation.en: I deserve the credit.
translation.zh: 你应该称赞我

translation.en: -Maybe you're God. -[Nok laughs]
translation.zh: 或许你就跟老天爷一样

translation.en: [Phil] Is that the sweetest thing ever?
translation.zh: 这是史上最可爱的食物

translation.en: -Have you ever had dumplings like these? -No.
translation.zh: -你吃过这样的饺子吗？-没有

translation.en: It feels like I'm in a palace
translation.zh: 我感觉自己身处宫殿

translation.en: and they're serving me, like, the king's favorites.
translation.zh: 他们给我呈上国王最爱的食物

translation.en: My customers, they deserve it. They deserve to have this in Philly.
translation.zh: 我的顾客值得品尝这个他们应该在费城吃到这种美食

translation.en: Is it worth a trip to Philadelphia? Yeah.
translation.zh: 费城之旅值不值？当然值了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 很值

translation.en: Are you ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: -I am ready. Tell us what's what. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我准备好了 告诉我们这是什么-好

translation.en: -[Nok] This is called massaman curry. -[Phil] Yeah.
translation.zh: 这叫玛莎曼咖喱

translation.en: [Phil] Oh, you've got the purple yam in there.
translation.zh: 里面有紫薯

translation.en: -Yes-- -You like purple and blue, don't you?
translation.zh: -对…-你喜欢紫色和蓝色 对吧？

translation.en: -I love color. -Me too.
translation.zh: -我喜欢色彩-我也是

translation.en: This is the curry that's one of my mother's signatures.
translation.zh: 这是我母亲的一种特色咖喱

translation.en: -And it's really hard to make. -[Kevin] So good.
translation.zh: -真的很难做-太好吃了

translation.en: [Nok] It is good, right?
translation.zh: 很好吃吧？

translation.en: I mean, you know you're in an exceptional restaurant
translation.zh: 喝到这种汤时 你就知道

translation.en: when this is the soup.
translation.zh: 自己身处一家特别好的餐厅

translation.en: Do you have a dramatic dish we could put on the table?
translation.zh: 你有没有什么让人吃惊的料理呈上来？

translation.en: [Nok] Um, not so much.
translation.zh: 没有了

translation.en: Holy moly.
translation.zh: 哎呀呀

translation.en: -And this is tom yum. -[Nok] Tom yum Kalaya.
translation.zh: -这是冬阴功汤-冬阴功汤

translation.en: -Oh, you're kidding. This is soup. -This is like no tom yum you've ever had.
translation.zh: -你在开玩笑吧 这是汤-这是你从来没有吃过的冬阴功汤

translation.en: No. Usually, these guys sit it out.
translation.zh: 对 通常没有这些食材

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah. No, this is--
translation.zh: 没错 是有…

translation.en: Let me serve you. So, in the broth there is lot of herbs
translation.zh: 我来给你盛 汤里有很多香草

translation.en: and mushroom and barramundi.
translation.zh: 蘑菇和尖吻鲈

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [Jeff] Oh my gosh.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: This is just the best.
translation.zh: 这是最好喝的汤

translation.en: This is amazing soup.
translation.zh: 这汤真是不可思议

translation.en: -[server] May I set this down? -[Kevin] Oh yeah. [Phil] Anything you want.
translation.zh: -我可以把这个放在这里吗？-你想怎样都可以

translation.en: [Nok] It's the toasted beef curry.
translation.zh: 这是烤牛肉咖喱

translation.en: -This one is the killer, isn't it? -This is the killer.
translation.zh: -这道菜是爆辣杀手锏 对吗？-这是爆辣杀手锏

translation.en: -Did you have this last time? -[Kevin] Yeah, it's one of my favorites.
translation.zh: -你上次吃这道菜了吗？-吃了 这是我的最爱之一

translation.en: -It's-- -[Jeff] She didn't hold back.
translation.zh: -真的…-她没有抑制辣度

translation.en: I mean, this is way up there.
translation.zh: 我是说这道菜辣度很高

translation.en: -This is near the top of the spicy plates. -[Nok] It's complex.
translation.zh: -接近辣菜的顶级了-很复杂

translation.en: Oh yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Is it there yet?
translation.zh: 感受到辣度了吗？

translation.en: I have to do this because I don't want to show…
translation.zh: 我不得不这样因为我不想让大家看到…

translation.en: my brains come out my nose.
translation.zh: 我的脑子从鼻子里出来了

translation.en: Hey, Google. Video call Raymond.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 给雷蒙德打视频电话

translation.en: There he is. Oh my God.
translation.zh: 他来了 天哪

translation.en: [Raymond] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: Is it possible you're getting even better looking?
translation.zh: 有没有可能你变得更帅了？

translation.en: Yes, because I started from a very low place.
translation.zh: 没错 因为我最开始颜值太低了

translation.en: I'm in Philadelphia. Look at me go.
translation.zh: 我在费城 看我在干什么

translation.en: You know what's good in Philadelphia? The soft pretzel.
translation.zh: 你知道费城有什么好吃的吗？柔软的椒盐卷饼

translation.en: What about the cheesesteak?
translation.zh: 那牛肉奶酪三明治呢？

translation.en: I ate my body weight in cheesesteak.
translation.zh: 我吃了自己体重级的牛肉奶酪三明治

translation.en: -Did you? -It was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: -Look what I brought! -Oh. Isn't that nice?
translation.zh: -看我拿来了什么！-真不错

translation.en: Look, people.
translation.zh: 看吧 各位

translation.en: That's my dad and Phil's dad on the set of Everybody Loves Raymond.
translation.zh: 这是我爸爸和菲尔爸爸在《人人都爱雷蒙德》的片场

translation.en: Well, tell the people a couple of your father's great lines just from life.
translation.zh: 给大家讲几句你爸爸生活中的精彩台词

translation.en: -Uh, boy. I don't know if I can repeat it. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 哎呀 我不知道自己能否复述出来

translation.en: When answering machines existed,
translation.zh: 还有电话答录机时

translation.en: he found out how to play back my answering machine
translation.zh: 他摸索出了如何从来电中回放我的答录机

translation.en: from calling up. You know, "Boop, boop, boop."
translation.zh: “砰砰砰！”

translation.en: And it would play back my messages and he would listen,
translation.zh: 答录机会回放我的留言 他会听

translation.en: and then he would leave a message on mine, you know, like,
translation.zh: 然后在我的答录机上留言

translation.en: "Hey, Anna,
translation.zh: “嗨 安娜

translation.en: your girlfriend Linda went to the doctor today." -"She wants you to call her," like that. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你女朋友琳达今天去看医生了她想让你打个电话”

translation.en: 'Cause he thought it was funny.
translation.zh: 他觉得这很好玩

translation.en: [chuckles] It is a little funny.
translation.zh: 是有点好玩

translation.en: And I kind of thought it was funny, and my wife did not think it was funny.
translation.zh: 我也觉得好玩 但我妻子不觉得

translation.en: And she was like, "That's like reading our mail," blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh: 她说：“这就像在读我们的邮件”

translation.en: And I told my dad, I go, "Dad, I know it's funny."
translation.zh: 然后我跟我爸说：“我知道这很好玩我知道你只是犯傻…”

translation.en: "I know you're being silly, but she…" [mimics grumbling]
translation.zh: 然后我跟我爸说：“我知道这很好玩我知道你只是犯傻…” 他说：“好吧 随便吧”

translation.en: -[chuckles] -"Okay, all right, whatever."
translation.zh: 他说：“好吧 随便吧”

translation.en: And then the next thing he did was,
translation.zh: 他接下来做的是

translation.en: he learned from his phone he could hit the buttons "Boop, boop, boop,"
translation.zh: 他从自己的电话上学到了可以“砰砰！”地摁按钮

translation.en: and change our outgoing message.
translation.zh: 然后改变我们的应答信息

translation.en: So when my wife… We were outside the house,
translation.zh: 所以当我和我妻子不在家时

translation.en: and my wife called to hear our messages, and instead of hearing my voice
translation.zh: 我妻子打电话听留言 她没有听到我的声音

translation.en: she hears my father's voice say,
translation.zh: 而是听到了我爸的声音

translation.en: "Hi. You've reached Ray and Anna. They're not here." "You can leave a message."
translation.zh: “嗨 这里是雷和安娜家他们不在 请留言”

translation.en: "If you want me, Al Romano, I'm at 2-6-8-2-0…" yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: “如果你想找我 阿尔罗马诺的话请拨打26820…”

translation.en: -[laughs] -And, um, my wife literally cried.
translation.zh: 然后我妻子真的哭了

translation.en: She was so mad.
translation.zh: 她很生气

translation.en: So, Raymond, you know, we do this thing where we have a joke for Max.
translation.zh: 雷蒙德 现在节目有个惯例给麦克斯讲个笑话

translation.en: Have you thought about it?
translation.zh: 你想过笑话吗？

translation.en: Yes, well, I have a joke not only for Max…
translation.zh: 想过 我不仅要给麦克斯讲个笑话

translation.en: …but, if I'm not mistaken with my memory, I think I heard it from Max.
translation.zh: 而且如果我没记错的话 -我好像是从麦克斯那里听来的-很好

translation.en: Oh great.
translation.zh: -我好像是从麦克斯那里听来的-很好

translation.en: So, Mr. Greenberg wakes up, uh, in the emergency room.
translation.zh: 格林伯格先生在急诊室醒来

translation.en: And the doctor tells him, "Mr. Greenberg, you had a car accident."
translation.zh: 医生告诉他：“格林伯格先生 你出了车祸

translation.en: "The good new is you're fine."
translation.zh: 好消息是你安然无恙

translation.en: "The bad news is we couldn't save… your…"
translation.zh: 坏消息是我们救不了你的…

translation.en: I'll clean it up, "your… your privates."
translation.zh: 我会清理干净的 你的私处

translation.en: "We couldn't save them, but…
translation.zh: 我们没能救下 但是…

translation.en: there is some more good news." "We can reconstruct."
translation.zh: 有更好的消息 我们可以重建…

translation.en: "We understand you're gonna receive $9,000 from the insurance company."
translation.zh: 我们知道你将从保险公司收到9000美元

translation.en: "Which will come in handy 'cause it's $1,000 an inch to reconstruct."
translation.zh: 这会派上用场因为重建2.5厘米需要1000美元”

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: He goes, "Now, you may want to spend the whole nine."
translation.zh: 他说：“你可能会想花光整整9000美元

translation.en: "That's probably a conversation you should have with your wife, maybe."
translation.zh: 或许你该跟自己的妻子谈谈

translation.en: "There's no rush."
translation.zh: 不用急

translation.en: "On the other hand, you may want to spend 4,000 or 5,000."
translation.zh: 另一方面你可能想花4000或5000美元

translation.en: "That's another conversation."
translation.zh: 这就得再谈一次了

translation.en: "Go home, talk it over, come back when you're ready."
translation.zh: 回家好好聊聊 等你准备好再回来”

translation.en: So he leaves, and a week later, he comes back in the office…
translation.zh: 所以他走了 一周后他回到了那间办公室

translation.en: to the doctor's office, and he comes in,
translation.zh: 那位医生的办公室然后医生说：“格林伯格先生

translation.en: and the doctor says, "Mr. Greenberg, good to see you."
translation.zh: 那位医生的办公室然后医生说：“格林伯格先生 见到你真好你和妻子好好聊过了吗？”

translation.en: "Did you talk it over with your wife?"
translation.zh: 见到你真好你和妻子好好聊过了吗？”

translation.en: He says, "I did." He says… The doctor says, "And what did you decide?"
translation.zh: 他说：“聊过了”医生说：“你的决定是什么？”

translation.en: He says, uh, "We're getting granite countertops."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们要买花岗岩台面”

translation.en: -[chuckles] All right. -Thank you, Raymond.
translation.zh: -好了-谢谢你 雷蒙德

translation.en: -You made the show. -I'll see you, man.
translation.zh: -你讲得很好-再见 兄弟

translation.en: -You made the show. -All right. -Bye-bye. -Bye.
translation.zh: -你讲得很好-好 再见

translation.en: [Phil] My trip to Philadelphia is ending in style
translation.zh: 我的费城之旅

translation.en: with a feast at one of the best restaurants in America,
translation.zh: 以在美国最好的餐厅之一享用盛宴作为结束

translation.en: Michael Solomonov's incredible Zahav.
translation.zh: 迈克尔索洛莫诺夫不可思议的扎哈夫餐厅

translation.en: And everybody's here. Cristina and her husband Ben,
translation.zh: 大家都来了克里斯蒂娜和她的丈夫本

translation.en: Marc, Jeff, Kevin, Nok, Shola,
translation.zh: 马克、杰夫、凯文、诺克、肖拉

translation.en: Joe Beddia, even Monica and her family.
translation.zh: 乔巴迪亚还有莫妮卡和她的家人

translation.en: Her sister Jen and her brother Steve.
translation.zh: 她姐妹珍和她兄弟史蒂夫

translation.en: This is a great group.
translation.zh: 这群人很棒

translation.en: Hi. Welcome.
translation.zh: 嗨 欢迎大家

translation.en: A toast to the beautiful people I've met on my trip.
translation.zh: 敬我在旅途中遇见的美好的人

translation.en: -[Nok] Thank you for having us. -[Phil] Some of my favorite chefs ever.
translation.zh: -谢谢你邀请我们-敬我认识的最爱的主厨们

translation.en: -[Jeff] Cheers. -Cheers to everyone down there.
translation.zh: -干杯-为大家都来到这里干杯

translation.en: [Michael] Cheers, everybody.
translation.zh: 干杯 各位

translation.en: This is Michael Solomonov, in case you didn't know.
translation.zh: 这是迈克尔索洛莫诺夫如果你们之前不知道的话

translation.en: -Hey, guys. How are you guys? -Oh, hi.
translation.zh: -嘿 各位 你们好吗？-嗨

translation.en: Wow, what a really, like, chill table over here.
translation.zh: 哇 这里的气氛真的很放松

translation.en: -Isn't it nice? -[Michael] Can we get some more VIPs?
translation.zh: -是不是很好？-可以再来一些大人物吗？

translation.en: 'Cause my team isn't scared enough.
translation.zh: 因为我的团队还不够害怕

translation.en: -Thanks. They shouldn't be scared. -We're so happy to have you guys.
translation.zh: -谢谢 他们不应该害怕-我们很高兴你们能来

translation.en: Nobody's more appreciative than other chefs, right?
translation.zh: 厨师之间最会惺惺相惜了 对吧？

translation.en: [Michael] This is the best.
translation.zh: 这里是最棒的

translation.en: -Monica's tough, though. -Oh yeah, very tough.
translation.zh: -不过莫妮卡很难搞-没错 非常难搞

translation.en: Thank you, guys, so much for coming. Bete'avon or bon appétit.
translation.zh: 谢谢各位 非常感谢你们的到来祝你们用餐愉快

translation.en: We got some hot laffa here. You can just rip it apart.
translation.zh: 我们做了热拉法饼 你们可以撕开

translation.en: -[Phil] Hot laffa. -Roll up your sleeves.
translation.zh: 把你们的袖子卷起来

translation.en: -That was the name of my first album. -[Marc] Nothing wrong with hot laffa.
translation.zh: -那是我第一张专辑的名字-《终究是热拉法》

translation.en: Yeah. Jeff has that tattooed on his neck. "Hot laffa." I don't know if he's shown you yet.
translation.zh: 杰夫的脖子上文了那个“热拉法” 他给你看过吗？

translation.en: What did you call it when you wipe the hummus? You had a name for it.
translation.zh: 迈克尔 抹鹰嘴豆泥的过程叫什么？

translation.en: [Michael] You actually wipe it. So, when you say in Hebrew,
translation.zh: 其实是要抹 当你用希伯来语说

translation.en: "You want to eat some hummus with me?" You say… [speaks Hebrew]
translation.zh: “你想跟我一起吃点鹰嘴豆泥吗？”你说…

translation.en: Which means, "Do you wanna wipe some hummus with me?"
translation.zh: 意思是“你想跟我抹点鹰嘴豆泥吗？”

translation.en: -So that's it. You're a pro. -Yes!
translation.zh: -就是这样 你是专业的-没错！

translation.en: So you wipe the hummus.
translation.zh: 所以你们要抹鹰嘴豆泥

translation.en: We've got twice-cooked eggplant that Nok's got.
translation.zh: 我们有诺克做的回锅茄子

translation.en: We've got beets with tahina and then our hummus tahina.
translation.zh: 我们有牛肉配中东烤芝麻酱还有我们的中东烤芝麻酱鹰嘴豆泥

translation.en: All right, so enjoy.
translation.zh: 好了 大家慢用

translation.en: When I opened the restaurant, the support that I had from the community,
translation.zh: 我开餐厅的时候得到了这个团体的支持

translation.en: Mike, from everybody, is just amazing.
translation.zh: 麦克和大家的支持 真的很棒

translation.en: -Yeah, we're like… right-- -Neighbors. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对 我们就像… -邻居-没错

translation.en: She'll come over at seven o'clock at night and she'll be like, "Chef!"
translation.zh: 她七点就会过来 然后说：“主厨！”

translation.en: -[Nok chuckles] -Is that right? -"I have some food for you." -What?
translation.zh: -是吗？-“我有一些吃的要给你”

translation.en: She'll bring us 18 things. I'm like, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: 然后给我们带了18种美食我说：“天哪”

translation.en: -Oh my God. See, that's community. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 天哪 这就是团体

translation.en: This is a community, yeah.
translation.zh: 真的是一个团体 没错

translation.en: So, we got eggplant barbecued with zhug, which is a Yemenite chili paste.
translation.zh: 我们做了茄子烧烤配苏胡克就是一种也门辣椒酱

translation.en: -[Michael] And on top-- -Oh! What, are you ironing it?
translation.zh: -在上面…-你在熨烫吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. And we're gonna sort of-- -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 没错 我们要…

translation.en: [Nok] Where do you get this tiny thing?
translation.zh: 你从哪弄来的这个小玩意？

translation.en: You know what? I take care of laundry for everybody.
translation.zh: 你们知道吗？我负责给大家洗衣服

translation.en: And what we're doing is burning a little bit of the garlic
translation.zh: 我是在烧一点大蒜

translation.en: and the ginger and the cardamom in there as well.
translation.zh: 还有姜 里面还有豆蔻

translation.en: You're a showman, Michael. You're a showman.
translation.zh: 你真爱出风头 迈克尔

translation.en: Guys, leave your pants here. I'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 把你们的裤子留在这里 我会洗好

translation.en: Yeah, I might have to.
translation.zh: 我可能真得这么做了

translation.en: [Michael] You know, Phil, I actually need your help for this last course, all right?
translation.zh: 菲尔 我需要你帮我做最后一道菜

translation.en: Yes, he was afraid things were going too well. -[Michael laughs] -So he needs me to help.
translation.zh: 好 他担心事情进展得太顺利所以需要我的帮助

translation.en: [Monica] Oh, Philip.
translation.zh: 菲利普

translation.en: -[Michael] You got it? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -明白了吗？-非常好

translation.en: [Michael] Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: 好 那就开始吧

translation.en: [Phil] Ladies and gentlemen, may I present one of my favorite dishes in the world.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 请允许我隆重介绍 世界上我最爱的食物之一

translation.en: This is his lamb shoulder…
translation.zh: 这是他做的羊肩…

translation.en: -[Nok] And you cooked this? -…with molasses…
translation.zh: -你做的这道菜吗？-配糖浆…

translation.en: -[Monica] Bravo. -…and pomegranate.
translation.zh: -太棒了-还有石榴

translation.en: -Oh my goodness. -[Jeff] Wow.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: [Phil] This is when I fell in love with Michael.
translation.zh: -哇-我就是因为这道菜爱上了迈克尔

translation.en: -And I approve. -[Marc] Wow.
translation.zh: -我同意-哇

translation.en: Oh, and this is… You do this. You do this.
translation.zh: 拿着这个 要这么吃

translation.en: [Marc] I'm going in.
translation.zh: 我要开吃了

translation.en: [Monica] This is good.
translation.zh: 真好吃

translation.en: -[Nok chuckles] Are you dancing? -This is so good.
translation.zh: -你在跳舞吗？-超好吃

translation.en: -[Phil] Monica. Come on. -[Jeff] Wow.
translation.zh: 莫妮卡 -来吧-哇

translation.en: [Phil] Community really is the name of the game in Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 在费城 团体的力量大过天

translation.en: To me, that's always meant family.
translation.zh: 对我来说 那一向意味着家人

translation.en: And, with friends old and new here,
translation.zh: 和新老朋友在这里

translation.en: what are friends but the family you choose?
translation.zh: 朋友真的就是你选择的家人

translation.en: And sometimes ride.
translation.zh: 有时还会骑马

translation.en: So, Mr. WC Fields, save your tombstone,
translation.zh: 所以 WC菲尔德斯先生省下你的墓碑吧

translation.en: because I'd rather be in Philly than a lot of other places.
translation.zh: 因为我更愿意待在费城而不是其他地方

translation.en: One thing's for sure, I know I'll eat well.
translation.zh: 有一件事是肯定的我知道我会吃得很好

translation.en: In all the shows we've done,
translation.zh: 在我们做过的所有节目里

translation.en: I think I've eaten more this week in Philadelphia
translation.zh: 我感觉自己这周在费城吃得

translation.en: than in any other city in the world.
translation.zh: 比世界上任何其他城市都多

translation.en: -[Phil] Michael! -[group cheers]
translation.zh: 迈克尔！

translation.en: [Michael] Thank you, guys, so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你们

translation.en: This means everything to me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说意义重大

translation.en: I love you guys. I love this city.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 我爱这个城市

translation.en: -[Phil] Yes. -I love this city.
translation.zh: -没错-我爱这个城市

translation.en: -I f****** love this city so much. -Don't curse!
translation.zh: -我爱死了这个城市-别说脏话！

translation.en: -Sorry. -[group laughs]
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: It's Philly. We're trying to keep it real.
translation.zh: 这就是费城 我们在努力保持真实

translation.en: ♪ Somebody feed him now ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：吴阳阳
